English.Text: It's a sword-swishing masterclass! Your champion contorts to cut the liana above their right arm, and once free, cuts one daringly close to the neck, so that with trapeze-like ripple they may dismount to the floor of the ravine. "Simple!" they declaim, straightening up, "follow me if you dare!" There are hoots and cheers from the gallery above as the rest swing down on lianas like an army of spider monkeys.
